ygData.subject: Re: Cut and Paste form EQ'Lizer
ygData.msgSnippet: I really dont agree with this at all.. Why should we be able to gate when rangers, bards, rouges (cant remember what others) cant? Those are not viable
ygData.messageBody:
I really dont agree with this at all.. Why should we be able to gate when
rangers, bards, rouges (cant remember what others) cant? Those are not
viable solutions. This isnt a flame im just simply stating that those
cannot fit this game.. What they really need is a weapon specialization
like how mages can specialize in magic we can specialize in 1h slash or 2h
slash. What that could do is improve the delay time of the swing. Cause
more damage by a bit. I think that would improve warrios a LOT more then
spells and im sure everyone in the game of any class would not mind it at
all.

Klaen

On Thu, 10 Jun 1999, Elena Glenn wrote:

> James....I also am getting a little bored with my level 19 Barbarian Warrior. One of the reasons, I guess, that I started the Bard. I do think that Verant has overlooked us slightly. When I played Realm, the warrior on there could buy mana and cast spells. Agreed, they didn't work as well as the mages did, but we still could have the basics. I would like to see Verant come up with another plan. Perhaps some sort of magic skill, so at the very least, we could gate and cast healing on ourselves.
>
> Leri
>
